data.text:
Aryn O'Donnell is VP of Corporate Services at Fieldwork, known by many to be one of the most trustworthy and engaged #qualitativeresearch partners in the #mrx industry. But what many people donâ€™t know about Aryn is that the first paycheck she ever drew was for a role she played in #musicaltheater. Aryn and I discuss her theater days, the value of backroom focus group interactions and how #AI frees people up do what they do best. We also discuss her recent appreciation for the world of metal music \m/ Watch below or find+sub to the Rock n' Roll Research Podcast wherever you get your podcasts. [If you are in Dallas for the Quirk's Media Event this month, come check out the new Fieldwork Dallas facility on February 29th at the Insights Association - South Central Chapter â€œLeaping for Insightsâ€ happy hour event! Link in the comments.] #facetofacemrx ##newfoundglory #brandicarlile #foxyshazam #kelloggmba
